value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Alfonse! Sharena! It's time to head
back to the battlefield for another
training exercise.$k$pThis time, we'll head to the continent
of Valentia.$k$pThe north and south are starkly
different. Our battle will take place in
the north—the Rigelian Empire.$k$pI want to see each army strive hard
to win this one!$k$p
